jd:
Role: Business Analyst

Ensure NYGC clients comply with all compliance and reporting requirements under the various New York State and New York City incentive programs.

Organize and reconcile large amounts of data to ensure proper reporting to government agencies while delivering a high touch client experience.

Request, collect, analyze, prepare, and file Client s compliance reports with agencies to obtain approval certificates.

Analyze and review data for discrepancies and notify appropriate parties of reporting deficiencies and follow through until corrections are received.

Collect and analyze quantitative data and create meaningful spreadsheet reports for discussion with NYGC clients and submission to various government agencies.

Research, analyze, interpret, and present findings on complex economic data, technical studies, and other data and documents related to economic development projects and programs.

Research program regulations by reviewing regulatory bulletins and other sources of information.
